episode.title: Cariboo Tech Progress - Regional Resilience
episode.description:
Riley and Casey explore technology and society in rural communities. Today's focus: Regional Resilience.

NEWS ROUNDUP: We break down üìç [Williams Lake Tribune] Williams Lake Tribune Article and [CFJC Today Kamloops] Week in Review: Week of January 19, plus 1 more stories, and explore what these developments mean for communities like ours.

RURAL CONNECTIONS: Deep dive into regional resilience, discussing how rural and remote communities can thoughtfully adopt and adapt emerging technologies.

Hosts: Riley (rural tech systems) and Casey (community development).
